tooltip.whackyutilities.crucible_tooltip: Melts down Stone to create Lava. Needs to be placed above a valid Heat Source.
tooltip.whackyutilities.iron_crucible_to: Melts down Stone to create Lava. Needs to be placed above a valid Heat Source. Internal Speed Modifiers: 2X
tooltip.whackyutilities.gold_crucible_to: Melts down Stone to create Lava. Needs to be placed above a valid Heat Source. Internal Speed Modifiers: 4X
tooltip.whackyutilities.diamond_crucible: Melts down Stone to create Lava. Needs to be placed above a valid Heat Source. Internal Speed Modifiers: 8X
tooltip.whackyutilities.netherite_crucib: Melts down Stone to create Lava. Needs to be placed above a valid Heat Source. Internal Speed Modifiers: 16X
tooltip.whackyutilities.powered_crucible: Melts down Stone to create Lava. Can use RF to accelerate that process and doesn't need to be placed above a valid Heat Source. Internal Speed Modifiers: 1X/2X
tooltip.whackyutilities.powered_iron_cru: Melts down Stone to create Lava. Can use RF to accelerate that process and doesn't need to be placed above a valid Heat Source. Internal Speed Modifiers: 2X/4X
tooltip.whackyutilities.powered_gold_cru: Melts down Stone to create Lava. Can use RF to accelerate that process and doesn't need to be placed above a valid Heat Source. Internal Speed Modifiers: 4X/8X
tooltip.whackyutilities.powered_diamond_: Melts down Stone to create Lava. Can use RF to accelerate that process and doesn't need to be placed above a valid Heat Source. Internal Speed Modifiers: 8X/16X
tooltip.whackyutilities.powered_netherit: Melts down Stone to create Lava. Can use RF to accelerate that process and doesn't need to be placed above a valid Heat Source. Internal Speed Modifiers: 16X/32X
tooltip.whackyutilities.auto_hammer_tool: Crushes down compressed Block. Internal Speed Modifier: 1X
tooltip.whackyutilities.gold_auto_hammer: Crushes down compressed Block. Internal Speed Modifier: 2X
tooltip.whackyutilities.diamond_auto_ham: Crushes down compressed Block. Internal Speed Modifier: 3X
tooltip.whackyutilities.netherite_auto_h: Crushes down compressed Block. Internal Speed Modifier: 4X
